message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of our premium product with you. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. As we're just starting the negotiation, I'd like to make a reasonable offer. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1,400,000.

Alice, thank you for the offer. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate,  $1,400,000 is still a bit higher than my budget.  I'm prepared to pay $1,250,000 for the product. This is a fair price considering my needs and your desired selling price.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1,250,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer a price of $1,350,000. This is a compromise that I believe is fair considering the value of the product and your needs.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise.  However, $1,350,000 is still a bit too high for me.  Let's split the difference - I'm willing to offer $1,300,000. This would be a fair deal for both of us, allowing me to stay within my budget and you to get a reasonable price for the product.

I understand your desire to stay within your budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1,300,000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer a price of $1,320,000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I believe it's still a fair price considering the value of the product.

Alice, I understand your position, but $1,320,000 is still a bit outside my comfort zone.  I'm prepared to offer $1,280,000. This is a fair compromise, giving you a good price for the product while allowing me to stay within my budget. Let's close this deal!

I understand your concerns, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1,280,000. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum acceptable price. I'm willing to offer a price of $1,300,000. This is the best I can do, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

Alice, I appreciate your flexibility.  While $1,300,000 is closer, it's still a bit above what I can comfortably pay. I'm willing to offer $1,290,000. This is a fair compromise that will allow us to close the deal and avoid any further back-and-forth.

I understand your desire to stay within your budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1,290,000. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum acceptable price. I'm willing to offer a price of $1,295,000. This is the best I can do, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
